HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: GLS ČR: 89 Kč, Balíkovna na adresu: 80 Kč, Zásilkovna domů (max 15 kg): 89 Kč, PPL doručení na adresu: 99 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 1 500 Kč.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: GLS výdejní místo: 40 Kč, Balíkovna: 65 Kč, Zásilkovna (do 5 kg): 65 Kč, PPL parcelshop: 65 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 1 500 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: GLS (Alza Boxy): 40 Kč, Balíkovna (Alza Boxy): 65 Kč, BrainMarket box – Ostrava: 1 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 1 500 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: 1 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 1 500 Kč.

express_delivery.pricing: Express Osobní odběr – Ostrava, Cihelní 3286: 1 Kč, zdarma nad 1 500 Kč.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: BrainMarket.cz offers home delivery, parcel shop/locker pickup, and in-store pickup in Ostrava and Brno. PROVIDERS: Main carriers are GLS, Balíkovna, Zásilkovna, and PPL. PRICING: Home delivery costs range from 80 Kč to 99 Kč. Parcel shop/locker pickup ranges from 40 Kč to 65 Kč. In-store pickup is 1 Kč. Free shipping is available for all delivery methods on orders over 1,500 Kč. The cash on delivery (COD) surcharge is 39 Kč. NOTABLE FEATURES: The store offers its own 24/7 'BrainMarket box' locker in Ostrava for 1 Kč. Express in-store pickup is available at one Ostrava location. Some services have weight limits (e.g., Zásilkovna parcel shop up to 5 kg, Zásilkovna home delivery up to 15 kg). WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented very clearly in a table, making it easy to compare prices and the free shipping threshold. However, standard delivery timeframes are not mentioned for any of the services.
